posts.author: foojin
posts.content:
Is it possible to set it up on your own and independant of any (bioware master) servers etc?

Just wanted to collect it if its possible so i can setup my own someday (since i'm leaving for travelling very soon).

posts.author: Mithril Jack
posts.content:
I have never tried this myself so caveat emptor, but here is the download page for WoG. The DMs update the server quite often , but as you can see this one is only 11 days old.

http://nwvault.ign.com/View.php?view=Mo ... il&id=3867

Note that you will need to download and install all 3 files listed, including the including the custom hak, as installing WoG turns your 'puter into a server with DM powers. Also make sure that you've patched your NWN game to version 1.69.
